Package com.payvment.continuuity

Class Summary
ClusterFeedQueryProvider Exposes Payvment Lish feeds as Queries (and then REST calls in the Gateway).
ClusterWriterFlow Flow application used to process clusters of categories.
ClusterWriterFlow.ClusterReset Flowlet that clears existing clusters from the data fabric.
ClusterWriterFlow.ClusterSourceParser Reads raw events from the cluster input stream and parses the input CSV into a tuple that will be written in the next flowlet.
ClusterWriterFlow.ClusterWriter Flowlet that writes cluster entries to the cluster table in the data fabric.
Constants  
ProductFeedFlow  
ProductFeedFlow.ProductActivityFeedUpdaterFlowlet  
ProductFeedFlow.ProductProcessorFlowlet  
ProductFeedParserFlowlet  
SocialActionFlow Flow application used to process Lish social actions in order to generate activity feeds and popular feeds of products.
SocialActionFlow.ActivityFeedUpdaterFlowlet Flowlet that performs checks of values generated in the primary updates and determines whether to insert an activity feed entry.
SocialActionFlow.PopularFeedUpdaterFlowlet Flowlet that performs checks of values generated in the primary updates and determines whether to perform any additional insertions for the popular feed, and if so, performs those operations.
SocialActionFlow.SocialActionProcessorFlowlet Flowlet that performs the primary updates to counters that track the all time and hourly scores of products.
SocialActionParserFlowlet Flowlet parses social actions from their JSON format into an internal SocialAction object and then into a tuple to the next flowlet.
